info.name: Morning Brew Cafe
info.description: Morning Brew Cafe is your go-to spot for fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and artisan coffee. We serve a delightful selection of breakfast and brunch dishes, along with a variety of hot drinks and freshly squeezed juices to energize your day.

menu.description: Start your day right with our hearty breakfast options made from fresh ingredients.

items.name: Nutty granola
items.description: house made granola w/ macerated berries, greek yoghurt & orange honey

items.name: Lemon & almond porridge
items.description: lemon curd, rasperries, blueberries & toasted almonds

items.name: Eggs any way on sourdough toast
items.description: two free range eggs w/ Fed sauce

items.name: Acai bowl
items.description: a√ßai, house made granola, macerated berries & peanut sauce

menu.description: Our brunch menu features a delicious blend of breakfast and lunch items perfect for any time of the day.

items.name: Emily's banana bread
items.description: vanilla mascarpone or butter, served toasted

items.name: Smashed avocado & poached eggs
items.description: on sourdough w/ chilli salt & house pickles

items.name: French toast
items.description: Macerated berries, white chocolate & almond crumble, whipped vanilla mascarpone & salted caramel

items.name: Egg benedict
items.description: poached free range eggs, spinach & fresh hollandaise on sourdough toast

items.name: Halloumi & shrooms
items.description: pan fried halloumi w/ garlic & thyme roasted mushrooms, free range poached eggs, Fed sauce & dukkah mix on sourdough toast

items.name: Turkish eggs
items.description: free range poached eggs on whipped garlic yoghurt w/ hot chilli butter & za'atar served w/ sourdough toast

items.name: Steak & eggs
items.description: 8oz sirloin steak, fried eggs, Fed sauce & salsa verde (halal beef available on request)

items.name: Ceddar corn fritters
items.description: stacked with bacon or smoked salmon, avocado, two poached eggs, sweet chilli & cucumber sop & lime sour cream

menu.description: Enjoy our artisanal hot drinks crafted from the finest ingredients.
